desc: BT2402 (red label) belongs to a family of proteins that replace homoserine kinase (thrB) in threonine biosynthesis (green nodes). The phosphate donor is not known. They are related to cofactor-independent phosphoglycerate mutases (blue nodes). The binding sites for two zinc ions are conserved (but not the binding site for calcium).
structure of phosphoglycerate mutase PH0037 [Pyrococcus horikoshii]
